remarks: A finite semiring sum multiplied by a constant, analogous to ~ gsummulc1 .  (Contributed by AV, 23-Aug-2019.)
statement:
srgsummulcr.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
srgsummulcr.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
srgsummulcr.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` R ) $.
srgsummulcr.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
srgsummulcr.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. SRing ) $.
srgsummulcr.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
srgsummulcr.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
srgsummulcr.x $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> X e. B ) $.
srgsummulcr.n $e |- ( ph -> ( k e. A |-> X ) finSupp .0. ) $.
srgsummulcr $p |- ( ph -> ( R gsum ( k e. A |-> ( X .x. Y ) ) ) = ( ( R gsum ( k e. A |-> X ) ) .x. Y ) ) $.
$d .x. k $.
$d A k $.
$d B k $.
$d Y k $.
$d k ph $.
